titleStmt.title: Glorifying of God the just tribute of a thankfull people, discovered and press'd in a sermon preach'd December 2. 1697. Being the day of thanksgiving for the peace.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Jonathan Robinson, at the Golden Lyon, in St. Paul's Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A thanksgiving sermon on Psalm 50. verse 15.
Reproduction of the original in the Trinity College Library, Cambridge.
